name: puu
description:
Short Puzzle Game about Puu, an apprentice witch with the Push&Pull magic. She must use her Push and Pull projectile to clear out the obstacles and reach the end of the Dungeon. This game is inspired by sokoban box pushing game and 2D Legend of Zelda. 

Completed prototype as an assignment for Digital Media Studio 4: Game Design at RMIT University Vietnam.  This is my first game project, I've learned a lot about game design principles and 2D asset creation. This is a really valuable experience for me.

Special thanks to Mr. Tom Nguyen and Mr. Thanh Nam Nguyen at Vinamation for supervising this project.

CREDITS NameRolenonaneva (Anh Nguyen)Game Design, Art, UIThanh Nam NguyenProgrammingTom NguyenSupervisor MUSIC
